title: HJA 4pcs Carbon Fiber Compatible fit Nissan Car Door Front/Rear Sill Plate Protectors, Sticker Decorative Door Entry Guard Door Threshold Scratch Pad Film Compatible Nissan
features: [nti-Scratch Door Sill Guards]: Front and rear panel stickers can prevent vehicles door sill from scuffing, scratch and fray. They will protect your vehicles from hurt and keep it surface paint perfect.

[Multifunctional]: The anti-slip design, groove design and anti-slip function of this black carbon fiber protective cover can effectively protect the door sill plate, prevent annoying scratches and provide protection. It can also be used to cover any existing scratches, paint damage.
[Excellent Material]: Made of high-quality PVC rubber, abrasion resistance, anti-aging, durable, flexible, and bendable. Not easy to break even if trampled often, and dirty is easy to wipe clean.

[Flexible Scuff Protective Bumpers]: Cover on other places of your car to protect them from scuff and scratch, like side skirt, bottom of side door, front and rear bumpers, exterior mirror and other parts.

[Installation Steps]: No drilling and welding needed, no damage to your vehicle. 1.Make sure which stickers you should cover on current place before action. 2. Use water to clean dust of four door sill positions, and then wait it dry. 3. Peel the protective film off at its back and stick. 4.Take credit card or scraper to remove bubbles for better adhesive.
description: Installation steps:1. Use a wet towel to clean the threshold, and make sure it is tidy and wait for it to dry.2. Confirm the correct position of the sill before operation, then peel off the adhesive protective layer film and paste it on the correct position.3. Press down on the sticker to remove air bubbles for a few minutes.4. Please do not wash the car within 24 hours, so that the best bonding strength can be achieved.Packing: 2 front door guard stickers (long) 2 back door guard stickers (short)
